about_the_game:
XIII: A Final Game of Tarot With Death

For how long can you play with death?

A psychedelic tarot game

Death comes to us all, and at last, your time has come. What you didn't expect was that the reaper herself would want to read your past. Play your cards right and keep your Karma balanced—the closer to zero, the better. Try to get the highest score possible!

Go beyond your limits

XIII: A Final Game of Tarot With Death is a casual game designed to hypnotize you for a few hours, especially appealing to high-score lovers. Compete with your friends and try to survive to your absolute limit.

Gameplay

Utilize the numerical relations between cards and their positions to keep the final sum as close to zero as possible. If you play well, you'll receive money to buy magical coins that modify the cards on the board. Manage these resources intelligently to get as far as you can—and watch out for RNGesus.

Short and sweet

80 hours? Nah! This is a simple and short game, but really fun. It'll grant more than a few hours for those who'd like a special challenge: going beyond the limits of tarot and beating round 23.

P.S: This game was originally developed for a game jam and will be the first of many to be released on steam! Thank you to everyone who buys it!
